text: Vale ʙa saʙaʙi a'mole, ki kardaand, hargiz orzui marg naxohand kard. (Zero onho az sidqi Pajomʙar Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ʙoxaʙarand. Va ʙa saʙaʙi on ci ki murtakiʙ sudand az kufru isjon, xudro az cannat mahrum va ʙa daromadani duzax lozim gardondand.) Alloh sitamkoronro mesinosad va muvofiqi kirdorason cazo xohad dod
